# inputGroups

**Instance Property**

The input groups an asset writer contains.

## Declaration

```swift
var inputGroups: [AVAssetWriterInputGroup] { get }
```

## Discussion

Add input groups to the asset writer using its [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAssetWriter/add(_:)-3san4] method.

## Configuring input groups

- **canAdd(_:)**: Determines whether the asset writer supports adding the input group.
- **add(_:)**: Adds an input group to an asset writer.
